class.name: TokenContractQuery
class.brief_description: A query builder for token contracts.
class.description: The TokenContractQuery class allows constructing queries for fetching token contracts from the Torii indexer, supporting filtering by contract addresses and types.

method.name: contract_addresses
method.description: Sets the contract addresses to filter by.

method.name: contract_types
method.description: Sets the contract types to filter by.
